txt.en: Overcome with emotion, Limril has become upset and Gladion is concerned for her.

'I am so embarrassed, [placeholder]. I asked you to set the table for six... because when last you were here, we were expecting Fuirion...'

She falls silent. After a moment she sighs unhappily and wrings her hands.

'But he will never join us for a meal again, will he? It will take some time to become used to that idea, if such a thing is even possible. I do not know if it is, but... we will try.

'I will talk to Gladion. For now, let us try to enjoy our meal.'
Greet Gladion as he comes home.

'I am glad you would share a meal with us once again, [placeholder]. I know you will insist on helping, so I will not try to dissuade you.\n\n'You recall where we keep the dishes? The hutch in the corner -- would you set the table for six, if you please?'
You should set the table for Limril
'Let us try and enjoy a quiet meal. I cannot pretend it will be easy... but we must do what we can to keep living, to keep surviving, no matter the family and the friends we have lost.'
Wait for the meal to begin
